snippet: Two 17-year-old girls told a federal judge about repeated acts of harassment at the New York State district; he approved a $4.48 million payment to aid the victims.
abstract: Federal Judge Kenneth M Karas approves $4.48 million settlement from Pine Bush Central School District in upstate New York to five Jewish students who say they were victims of anti-Semitism at the schools.
lead_paragraph: Two 17-year-old girls told a federal judge about repeated acts of harassment at the New York State district; he approved a $4.48 million payment to aid the victims.

headline.main: Settlement Over Anti-Semitic Bullying at Pine Bush Central Schools Is Approved
headline.print_headline: Schools’ $4.48 Million Payment Over Anti-Semitic Bullying Is Approved
